title: Catamenial Pneumothorax: Clinical Overview and Diagnostic Approaches
short_description: Clinical document describing catamenial pneumothorax, a rare condition causing recurrent lung collapse in women related to menstrual cycles.
long_description: This clinical document provides a comprehensive overview of catamenial pneumothorax, an extremely rare medical condition affecting women characterized by recurrent episodes of lung collapse (pneumothorax) that occur within 72 hours of menstruation onset. The document discusses the unknown etiology of the condition, its potential association with endometriosis, and outlines diagnostic approaches including detailed patient history, clinical evaluation, and advanced procedures such as video-assisted thoracoscopy (VATS). The text serves as an educational resource for healthcare professionals to understand the pathophysiology, clinical presentation, and diagnostic methodology for this rare gynecological-pulmonary condition.
